question: What is the name of the Cas13 based diagnostic test for the Zika and dengue viruses?
ideal_answer: The Cas13-based platform that can detect Zika and dengue viruses is called SHERLOCK (specific high-sensitivity enzymatic reporter unlocking).

snippets.text: In this study, we demonstrate that the Cas13-based SHERLOCK (specific high-sensitivity enzymatic reporter unlocking) platform can detect Zika virus (ZIKV) and dengue virus (DENV) in patient samples at concentrations as low as 1 copy per microliter.
